attributes.action: Increase the amount of Carer's allowance to at least £150 per week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present Carers are paid (via carers' allowance)the princley sum of £48 per week.
To employ someone to do the same work would cost in excess of £250 per week, it is therefore not unreasonable to ask the Government to make a realistic payment to people who chose to care for their disabled dependants.
